comments:
Hi
  first i open the Run dialog, and create a new Configuration(named
New_configuration (4) by default) under Java Application.
  then i rename the New_configuration (4)'s name to aaaaaaaa...aaa(number of 'a'
are 200).
  when i apply this change, the dialog not shown any message.But the .log file
is said:
